abilities.name: Tentacles
about: Creates a channeling beam that does constant damage at player location

abilities.name: Fire Trap
about: Throws a trap that explodes when triggered, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies

abilities.name: Teleport Slam
about: Strikes enemy foes down with a powerful blow

abilities.name: TriBomb
about: Creates an orb that explodes into 3 smaller projectiles flying in linear random direction

abilities.name: Mortar
about: Fires projectile that does damage on impact and when the projectile explodes
